sentences.en: A speck of mouse dung will spoil a whole pot of porridge.
sentences.cn: 经典英语爱情句子一粒老鼠屎,坏了一锅粥.

sentences.en: Beetles bury pellets of dung and lay their eggs within them.
sentences.cn: 甲壳虫把粪粒埋起来,然后在里面产卵.

sentences.en: Dung beetle mosquito talks about love, man: Your what profession?
sentences.cn: 屎壳郎蚊子谈恋爱, 郎: 你啥职业?

sentences.en: Elephants can produce over 35 kg of dung in a single day.
sentences.cn: 大象一天就能制造出三十五公斤以上的粪便.

sentences.en: European dung beetle ( Geotrupes stercorarius ) that flies with a droning sound.
sentences.cn: 飞行时发出嗡嗡声的东半球粪金龟子.

sentences.en: He eat the quantity of dung both from me and from thee.
sentences.cn: 他可以忍受我的,还有你的多少侮辱.

sentences.en: Her head rested on his shoulder, the pleasant smell of her hair conquering the pigeon dung.
sentences.cn: 她的头偎在他肩上, 头发的香味盖住了鸽屎臭.

sentences.en: Honeywell will design, test, install and commission Dung Quat's system.
sentences.cn: 霍尼韦尔将设计 、 试验 、 安装和调试DungQuat的系统.

sentences.en: I hated going into those dung - marked grounds to feed that dog.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌走进那地面满是粪迹的地方去喂狗.

sentences.en: It's too bad to see a fresh flower on a heap of cow - dung. He'll be the ruin of her!
sentences.cn: 鲜花插在牛粪上, 真 把她糟踏 啦 !

sentences.en: KJV Which perished at Endor : they became as dung for the earth.
sentences.cn: [新译]他们都在隐.珥被消灭,成了地上的粪土.

sentences.en: Most dung beetles burrow into the soil and bury dung in tunnels.
sentences.cn: 大多数蜣螂在地下挖洞,并将粪球埋在地下.

sentences.en: The barn was filled with the sour-sweet smell of fresh dung.
sentences.cn: 谷仓里弥漫着新粪酸甜的气味。

sentences.en: Tom: No.Although 75% of its raw materials is elephant dung, it is light delicate fragrance instead of stink. This is due to its special fabrication technology.
sentences.cn: 不，尽管这种纸里75％的原料都是大象的粪便，但它不但不臭，反而有一种淡淡的清香，这是源于它的特殊的制造工艺。

sentences.en: Workers at Sydney's harbourside Taronga zoo are refusing to collect animal dung in a protest over wages.
sentences.cn: 悉尼海港塔龙加动物园的工人因对工资的抗议而拒绝收拾动物粪便。

sentences.en: You can see the fresh buffalo dung on the country road.
sentences.cn: 你可以在乡间小路上看到刚屙下不久的水牛粪.

phrases.tran_cn: n. 蜣螂；金龟子科；甲虫

trans.tran_cn: 动物的粪便，粪肥，令人厌恶的东西
trans.tran_en: solid waste from animals, especially cows
